sections.heading: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Student Parent Data Collection Act.
sections.text: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Student Parent Data Collection Act.

sections.heading: Campus child care.  Beginning September 1, 2021, each public institution of higher education that operates one or more child care centers or early learning centers on its campus or is otherwise affiliated with a child care center or early learning center shall collect all of the following informatio
sections.text: Campus child care. Beginning September 1, 2021, each public institution of higher education that operates one or more child care centers or early learning centers on its campus or is otherwise affiliated with a child care center or early learning center shall collect all of the following information:

sections.heading: Family Educational Rights and Privacy Act of 1974
sections.text: The sharing and reporting of data under this Act must be in accordance with the requirements of the federal Family Educational Rights and Privacy Act of 1974. Nothing in this Act supersedes the federal Family Educational Rights and Privacy Act of 19

sections.heading: Effective date. This Act takes effect July 1, 2021.
sections.text: Effective date. This Act takes effect July 1, 2021.
